description: This file defines the SearchFragment class, which implements a search UI optimized for Android TV DPAD navigation. It includes keyboard input handling, displaying search results, managing user interaction, and communicating with a host activity.

classes.name: SearchFragment
classes.description: A Fragment representing a search screen with a custom on-screen keyboard and search results grid, designed for Android TV DPAD navigation.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment layout from XML.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes the Stores, views, adapters, and sets up key navigation.

methods.name: setupKeyboard
methods.description: Sets up the on-screen keyboard with keys, layout manager, and focus behavior.

methods.name: setupResults
methods.description: Sets up the search results grid and focus handling.

methods.name: buildKeyboardKeys
methods.description: Creates a list of keyboard keys including letters, numbers, and function keys.

methods.name: onKeyboardKeyPressed
methods.description: Handles input from the keyboard, updating the query or performing actions.

methods.name: applyBackspace
methods.description: Removes the last character from the query and updates display and results.

methods.name: renderQuery
methods.description: Displays the current query text and updates accessibility content descriptions.

methods.name: updateResults
methods.description: Fetches search results based on the current query and updates the results adapter.
